message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer Alice, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  How about $105?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $107.50
